name: Slash Ghoul
description:
Slash Ghoul

Slash Ghoul is a game created by Firebelley in 1 week. It's a 2D action game where you use a disembodied sword to destroy vile machines. Slash Ghoul features juicy bullet hell combat, a mini-campaign mode, 2 normal enemy types, 1 boss, and an endless wave mode that throws every enemy type at you.

Slash Ghoul was built to feel good and play well. Feedback is greatly appreciated!
